褪.definition: to slip out of sth; to hide sth in one's sleeve

褪下.definition: to take off (trousers); to drop one's pants

褪去.definition: to take off (one's clothes); (fig.) to shed (one's former image etc); (of a fad or the after-effects of a disaster etc) to subside; also pr. [tun4 qu4]

褪套兒.definition: (coll.) to break loose; to shake off responsibility
